name: SandalsChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Sandals Church”
”Alexa, ask Sandals Church to play the latest sermon”
”Alexa, ask Sandals Church to play the debrief”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sandals church
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to the latest Sandals Church sermon or episode of The Debrief podcast.

How to use the skill: 
"Alexa, open Sandals Church"
"Alexa, ask Sandals Church to play the latest sermon"
"Alexa, ask Sandals Church to play The Debrief" 

While you are listening to the media we support several other actions as well:
"Alexa, pause"
"Alexa, resume"
"Alexa, ask Sandals Church to fast forward by {time frame}"
"Alexa, ask Sandals Church to rewind by {time frame}"

We hope that you enjoy this skill and if you have any feedback you can contact us at web@sandalschurch.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
